com.asp.smartbeergreenhouse.thingsboard

Class OperationsAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.asp.smartbeergreenhouse.thingsboard.OperationsAPI

  • public class OperationsAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    OperationsAPI class

    It provides the methods to interact with REST API using methods defined in ThingsboardService interface

    It is used to get Thingsboard token and retrieved information from Thingsboard

    Author:
    Jaime Galan Martinez, Victor Aranda Lopez, Akos Zsolt Becsey.
    See Also:
    ThingsboardService, ThingsboardApiAdapter
